Bathroom had a nice shower. Overall place got the job done, made some good memories here with my friends.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Only complaint is that the refrigerator needs to be serviced or replaced. Stayed for a week, purchased food for a week. Everything placed in the fridge never got cold. And yes the temp was already set on the coldest setting

reviews_list.Main_Review: Really convenient stay. Hosts are super nice and helpful.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: it was cool small and convenient. the stove and the silverware and pots and pans were great
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: I disliked the area a little bit and the thin walls in the apartment. we could hear stuff from the room over and also there was only a tv with no modern channels or netflix hulu etc.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: The only thing that was ok was the shower. After we sprayed it down it probably was clean but nothing else was so why would we think housekeeping would.There was hair in the shower that's why we just stayed it down.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: I didn't see any roaches but Roach traps under the kitchen sink were not a good look. Roach traps in the tiny closet with a broken door. There was a bag of groceries left from the last guest in a bag on the table. No batteries in the remote,I fount one battery that was in the bathroom sink drain. Room smelled like cigarettes. Gross dirty towel and food wrapper under my bed. The towels that were provided had a smell as if they were not dried all the way and the floor mat gross no wash clothes were provided. The fire detector was missing oh no its was put in the refrigerator that didn't work so the food I payed for went bad. I turned  the temperature up and the freezer took two days to freeze a bottles of water. And still the refrigerator didn't get cold. Beds in the picture can't be the beds that we slept on they were thin and very uncomfortable and lots of dust on bed frame outside on the corners very visible.Got a parking ticket because they forgot to let us know that the city was doing work and we were never notified thanks for the heads up. Walls were dirty as if a kid was kicking the walls or someone's bike tires were being rubbed up against the walls. The beds had old bedding and two small smashed pillows that are there for your comfort. Oh don't forget about the homeless guy who lives right outside and the garbage outside. What a sight. We just went to the nearest Target and grabbed candles,defuser,towels,food and batteries to try and enjoy my stay but I feel ripped off $200 cleaning fee they could have went to the dollar store and got hands towels, candles, spray.ect...Damn it LA Damn it.i would have put more pictures but they only 4.🤷🏾‍♀️🤦🏾‍♀️epic fail  !!!!!

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Only the location, everything else was bad.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: To begin with: to get the keys you gotta go through some bushes what was kind discomforting since we were all tired and the spot had a difficult access. When we finally got to the hotel and headed to the bathroom to shower, the toilet lid was disgustingly dirty, the shower head fell on our heads (pay attention because if you’re 5’9 or taller you’ll have a hard time showering). The shower has low pressure which makes you take a long time to shower. Second: we couldn’t believe in the mattresses: it was SO annoying and old, super discomforting, you could feel all the metal parts on it since the filling was very poor and thin. We booked the studio from February 17th thru February 21st but we left on the 20th because we couldn’t stand sleeping so poorly. We barely spent time in there, only for sleeping and on the 19th someone from guest services called me while I was trying to have a good time on the beach saying there were complaints about us being loud??? We found it really disrespectful because as stated before we just went there to sleep and was always respectful and thoughtful of others. When we were looking for a place to stay in Hollywood and this studio came acros, I saw some specific complaints like the cleanliness and fridge not working. I decided to give it a try and contacted the host asking about the complaints and he said the fridge was fixed and would make sure to get the studio deep cleaned. We took food with us and we needed a fridge in good condition and surprise: got there and the fridge wasn’t cooling, we had to put all of our food in a cooler with ice, so much work! The sheets were very old and not clean, lots of stains, the AC was terribly dirty and would bring down allergies if we turned it on, so we were hot basically the whole stay. Plus, be aware of parking! host doesn’t provide parking and it’s TERRIBLE to find parking in the area and if you do, you can’t park overnight. A trip that was meant to be de-stressing just caused us so many headaches.

reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
i arrived last night to a broken lock box. I was left completely stranded and unable to get into the location or contact anyone.  i was forced to get a hotel. 
they text me at 7am not acknowledging all of my help requests. they said their guest services open at 9am. i called at 9am and they declined my call and told me to call back in an hour. the guest service number never connects you to anyone it’s just music. 
when i finally reached them i asked for them to send someone out. they said they wouldn’t send someone out unless i showed them on a video call and proved it was jammed. i had to walk all the way to the location and show them it was jammed and then walk back to my hotel. 
they tried to send someone out at night and i had to beg for someone to be sent out today. they said house keeping was coming in an hour. they texted me to walk back to the booking at 11:06. she told me housekeeping would be there at 11:15. I waited on the steps of the booking for over an hour. They told me the housekeeper was looking for parking. When i called the housekeeper she said she was still at her other job. I sat on the ground outside for over an hour waiting for someone to come. When the housekeeper arrived she hit the lockbox with a rock until it opened and that is how we got in. 
Once here for a couple hours they sent someone for a repair they did not i form us about.
The shower head flew off and we asked for help and they would only send help if we pretended to be their cousin. 
I have tried for days to get help and they have accused me of lying and pretending like they don’t know what i’m talking about when I have pictures and videos for all evidence. DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!! Unprofessional.

cercania de hollywood

NO RESERVÉIS ESTE APARTAMENTODesde el primer momento la situación era su realista, las llaves se encontraban escondidas en un cansado alejado de hotelAún peor fue la sorpresa de aquella habitación, no se encontraba limpia ya que tanto el suelo como las sábanas tenían manchas y suciedad de los anteriores inquilinos. Seguido a eso comprobamos que tan sólo habían dejado 4 toallas pequeñas para 4 adultos durante toda una semana Para más decepción al pedir repetidamente al alojamiento una limpieza de apartamento y cambio de sábanas, principalmente se niegan a ello y más tarde nos dicen que o puntuamos con un 8 el apartamento o no se hacen carga de nada.Por todo esto y mucho más no recomiendo bajo ningún concepto reservar este alojamiento.Adjunto fotos de como nos encontramos el apartamento y con lo que tuvimos que convivir durante una Semana
Las camas están muy feas, muy incómodas, el colchón está fatal, el espacio de la habitación es muy pequeño

reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: this place is not at all as described.  it isn’t a villa, doesn’t have 8 beds, but 2, there is no mini bar, Wi-Fi was available but the non hooked up tv that we asked to be hooked up could not connect to it so no tv entertainment, the washer was flooded halfway with water so no laundry, towels were strewn in bathroom and overall this place was just not inviting or comfortable with dim lighting fixtures making it worse.  furniture was sparse, place wasn’t cleaned, and it just felt dank and cold and unlived in.  we didn’t end up staying but left.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: it offered parking on site.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
this was not a villa, but a small home and it was not unfinished in construction, heater seemed barely to be working when it was 55 degrees inside.  the tv was not hooked up upon arriving so we asked the host to set it up but then the Wi-Fi was unreachable for the tv to connect to so basically no entertainment.  also, I had brought a load of laundry with me to do since listing claimed it had a washer and drier but the washer was backed up and unable to drain so washer stood half filled with water inside with nowhere to go.  the lighting was poor with dim lit fixtures, no mini bar was present and and bc we felt that too many amenities we had specifically chosen were not met or had issues that couldn’t be resolved I thought the host would agree to a cancellation w full refund or offer an alternative accommodation but instead he offered $30 refund for the inconveniences to the 192 we paid for the night.  we decided we were not comfortable, had no tv to watch, couldn’t do my laundry and with it being super cold with heater barely working, we decided to leave and not stay.  this was not a great experience from the start and I don’t recommend this accommodation for any future guests.  
thanks.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: I called an hour prior to arrival per instructions on confirmation email. We were told this room was not held, despite booking sending me confirmation. We were given a different condo at a totally different location at a 10% discount.  Not worth it,  but since it was our only option we took it, as we traveling from out of state.  The condo was nice and comfortable, however there were ants in the kitchen and master and the coffee machine didn't work.  They came to confirm coffee machine didn't work but didn't replace it during our trip. Again not worth the price we paid. And the service was not acceptable for the price we paid.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Caution! Do not book this apartment....just dont do it! This is a scam and do not be fooled!
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Nothing!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Caution! Do not book this apartment....just dont do it! It is a shame and a scam that this apartment is available to book on Booking.com.The whole apartment smells of cigarette and cannabis smoke - it is dirty and stinks. In addition, it is noisy, noisy and noisy again around the clock 7 days a week - you constantly have all sorts of annoying noises. Even with the windows closed, the noises are extremely loud.We booked the apartment for 5 nights and left early after just one night and booked another accommodation. This has never happened to us before! This was the worst accommodation we have ever had!The owner is extremely unfriendly, makes promises and does not keep them. The worst we have ever experienced. It is an absolute cheek to rent this apartment to travelers and despite multiple complaints we have not received a refund.Absolutely caution! This is a scam and do not be fooled!

The shower was very cold, there were no utensils in the kitchen to cook something.  When I asked to leave the bag for an hour, he said - get out!Three taxis was afraid to take me, because this is a dangerous area and I had bags, they were afraid to stop for a long time.

hotel_list.name: Private Los Angeles Room - Free WIFI, AC, TV, Private Fridge, Kitchen, near USC - Exposition Park - USC Memorial Coliseum - Banc of California BMO Stadium - Downtown Los Angeles DTLA - University of Southern California USC!!!

reviews_list.Review_Likes: I can only recommend this accomodation if you are looking for a clean and friendly place with a kind and funny host. They made my experience in LA a lot better than expected.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Easy check in! clean room! No worries what so ever!
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Easy check in! clean room! No worries what so ever!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Nothing

reviews_list.Review_Likes: AC did not work well in our room, it was 84 degrees in our room when the rest of the house was 71.

In general, the place is nice, about a 20-min walk from metro train station. The area does not look very safe, but not very dangerous either.The manager does not care much about recycling, but if you do, you can leave your recycling at the recycling station at the eastern end of the street (maybe 200 metres from the house).
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: It is difficult to find. It is not a scam, but it is not surprising that some guests find it so. THERE ARE THREE LOCATIONS OF ALMOST THE SAME NAME: 41st Street, 41st Drive, and 41st Place. The accommodation is at the last one. We went to the previous two first, and spoke to their owners. They receive many lost travellers. The manager of the accommodation did not care at all, and we got the email with (not much detailed) instructions on how to find the place only after check-in.We had BAD EXPERIENCE WITH THE MANAGER. We were allowed to keep luggage after check-out based on the condition of giving a 10-star review. We found it odd but agreed. On the last day, I had difficulties with the online system to do the review (and I think it is likely possible only after the manager marks us as checked-out, for which I had to remind him). The manager was then in fact black-mailing us through phone, threatening to throw our stuff away (emphasizing that the cleaner was coming, he did not give an answer what he really meant by that) in case we wouldn't submit the 10-star review within the next hour, then 45 minutes... The manager said we had to contact the support service of Booking.com in case the the review was not accessible in my profile yet. I tried to explain that I was doing my best, and would submit the review as soon as it appears in the online system. We managed in the end after one hour, and I had to send screenshots to prove that I was not lying. It was very stressful. I am changing the review right now. What the manager said was probably not even true, the cleaner came only many hours later, in the evening (when we returned for our luggage), and was not much into cleaning anyway. It was one of the most arrogant staff I have experienced during years of travels in different parts of the world.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: It's clean and comfortable

everything was fine. The room was nice and well equipped, as it was described. Andy is a nice and friendly host. Altough, this is house, not a hotel, so there are rules you should keep. The price is however much-much better than for instance staying in a motel or in a cheap hotel
Good location, great facilities and excellent experience all round

Based on the location, I was a little hesitant about making sure to be careful (I’m on a tight budget so thought I can sacrifice not the best looking location for price and cleanliness). Again, I was pleasantly surprised that the neighborhood was perfectly fine. New apartments being built on the block which make sense since it’s like 5 minute walk to USC. All in all, great stay, clean room, clean bathroom, and decent neighborhood.

Next to USC and the Expo. We attended an event at the Banc of California Stadium, and we just walked there from the house less than a block. House was super clean. Mattresses looked new. (I don’t know if the housekeeper lives at the property, but it seemed like she was there the whole week continuously cleaning the bathrooms and the kitchen over and over again.) Huge TV and full-size fridge in the room nice touch. Parking on the premises at the house was only $15. Banc of California charged my friend $45 for the event parking!!! Great value for the price.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: AC is way too cold/strong. I get it, it’s 110 degrees outside in LA, but my room was about 60 degrees when I checked in, so I had to leave the window open a bit to warm up the room to a comfortable 65-70 degrees.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: very accommodating to booking mistakes and even allowed me to wait with my luggage until my next booking available for check in.cleaners came to take care of house odor and cleaned the bathrooms which made for a pleasant second half of my stay.

Some of the people staying inside the home are not safe either.  there was a point when the restroom had 0 toilet paper and was not replaced until 2 days after the toilet paper was done.  no soap in the bathroom to wash hands either, had to wait a couple of days until anything was finished.  the toilets had crap all underneath it and people used the kitchen past 10pm all the time.  there is no security on the premise except cameras so no one really puts anyone in place when they are breaking some type of rule, except of course if you park in the parking lot and pay an extremely over priced amount when already paying this Andy person an extreme amount of money for a very horrible stay.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Reasonably good stay. Comfortable bed. Weird area. Don't walk around at night.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Andy, the host, was very friendly and accommodating. The bed was very comfortable. The space was cozy enough for two people. There was plenty of street parking (no need to pay for driveway parking).
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The neighborhood was incredibly sketchy. The bathroom was not tidy. The house itself holds 6 rooms, all of which seem to be home-sharing type accommodations. At any point in time you could be sharing the house with a maximum 5 other parties not including yourself. There was no established kitchen space. There were no hanging hooks in the room itself (I was in LA for a professional event & wasn't able to hang up any clothes), nor is there any sort of accessible closet space. There are small black ants everywhere. In LA you get what you pay for, and I am certainly aware of that. This was a last minute trip and was happy to secure the space, so I cannot fault the building or its hosts. Just not what I was expecting. This is a great value stay, especially for the LA area. If you're looking for no-frills this is the place to go.

reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
I would never stay here again! The staff was unbelievably snotty and screened my calls for the entire 12 hours before I checked in because I asked if it was a possibility (of course they have the right to say no) to refund me since I wasn't feeling well and would have preferred to stay with a friend while in the city. Not feeling well could have been something more serious and they still disregarded all of my attempts to contact them but when I called from another phone number they answered immediately. Very unprofessional and inconsiderate of other guests.
This is the worst hospitality staff I've encountered. This place is just another mediocre AirBnB operating out of a more run down neighborhood with no public transportation nearby. 
I parked in the driveway to check in, intending only to be there for a few minutes while I unpacked my heavy bags so I wouldn't have to carry them halfway down the block (they charge a daily fee to park in the driveway) but the 'receptionist' (can only speak to them through a camera on the front porch haha) would not send me the code and allow me to enter the house to take my things to my room quickly and then move my car. He said I had to move it before he sent the code, even though I had already paid in full for three nights, and then he threatened to tow my car and hung up on me.
These people are rude and dismissive. Nothing hospitable about them. The mattresses are on the floor and there are ants and insect traps all over the house. If you want a cheaper place to stay in a less than ideal part of the city then by all means...

reviews_list.Room_Type: King Room with Private Bathroom - Smoking
reviews_list.Review_Likes:
丁寧な対応、広い部屋、しっかり効くエアコン、シャワーの水圧も問題なし。
強いて言えば電子レンジがあれば完璧です。
すぐ隣にパンやドーナッツ、ピザ、コーヒーなどを売ってる店もあり、コインランドリーは歩いて2、3分です。
美味しいストリートタコスもコインランドリーの隣にあります。
日本語のガイドブックでは危険とされているエリアではありますが、LAはブロックが違えば治安も大分変わります。
レンタカーでの移動を前提としていますが、このモーテルが位置するエリアはそれほど危険ではありません。
とは言え、変な人もたまにいますんで主観によると思いますが。
仕事がら年間80〜100日はアメリカにいてLA滞在時はいつも泊まっていますが、優しいスタッフの対応も完璧です。
思いっきりローカルなLAを体験したいなら完璧なモーテルです。
車が有ればダウンタウンまで15分ほど、ハリウッドまでは空いてれば30分ほどで行けます。

reviews_list.Main_Review: The home is dirty and unkept. No instructions provided to guests. Solid house, great neighborhood.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Collecting the keys wasn't a problem. But, the house I booked wasn't the house I stayed at. The house that was booked was having electrical issues, and they needed to provide an alternative. They didn't reach out to inform me about this. I reached out for check-in instructions to the house I booked, and they then told me something was wrong. A proactive outreach is what should happen in this scenario.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The support team provided no clear instructions on how to check in, how to set up to wifi, how to use any amenity in the house. I had to text them the entire time with questions. Having a document with a set of instructions for guests upon entering the house is something that we shouldn't have to tell them to do. That is a basic necessity if you're going to be renting your house to anyone. The house was extremely dirty, there were stains everywhere. The hot tub and pool controls were not working. The garage door opener wasn't working (positive: they sent a new opener via Uber quickly). The theater room TV did not work. There were about 10 propane tanks in the backyard and every single one of them was empty, couldn't use the heaters. The toilet in the master bathroom didn't flush. The garage door popped out of the hinge and wouldn't close. Overall, this house is not kept up at all.

reviews_list.Main_Review: The Owner is disohonest and took all my money
reviews_list.Review_Likes:
I want to share my bad experience with this Host, hoping it may be useful. I'm used to traveling a lot, I've visited many places around the world, having been to more than 30 countries and known many people, but I have never met a person as rude and dishonest as the Owner of this room.
My disadventure started with me being just 10 mins late in respect to the booking hour (something i told him during the reservation) and, nevertheless, the Owner did not let me in the room, with the absurd justification that the person in charge of performing the check-in was already gone away. Moreover, after denying me access to the room (through a self check-in) he told me through the doorbell (that does not work properly, you can hear little to nothing) to go away and contact Booking to file a claim. Of course he kept the money, refused to refund me and deleted my 3 days reservation, so that night I found myself alone without any chance to get a room in an unknown and unfriendly neighborhood without internet connection (just for 10 mins late).
I managed to get by but I am not sure that anyone else in that situation would have been able to make do.
I decided to make another reservation the next day for that same room thinking we could find an agreement on what happened but he never answered back, refused to refund me and even encouraged me to leave a review on Booking. Most importantly he made me do a self check-in infact there is no person in charge for check-in.
The kitchen doesn't have enough items, i had to share the a couple of fork with other guests and also, no salt, no oil, no napkins.
The room doesn't have any soap and toilet paper and there was a lot of noise all day because there was a house being built exactly next to my room.
Be aware that he runs several rooms on Booking that will be not affected by this review but those are in the same building, so keep in mind if you are considering a place in the same area, probably it's his property as well.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Great location, great place to stay
reviews_list.Review_Likes: The room was really nice and exactly as described. The attached half bathroom was decorated nicely and both rooms appeared clean and fairly freshly painted. Kitchen was very well appointed with a stove, both Keurig and regular coffee makers, a kettle etc. Room had our own fridge/freezer, so there was never an issue with food going missing. Really nice size dresser/closet in an alcove in the bedroom. Check-in was all done remotely by phone/security camera and, while it felt a little unusual initially as we've more often stayed in hotels, it was very smooth and all relevant information was provided promptly. Great safety measure for anyone who is still Covid wary! All doors use security number locks - no risk of losing a room key, or of needing a second key if you go out separately. Just a few minutes' walk from the Science Center, Memorial Coliseum, Banc of California Stadium, Natural History Museum etc.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Clean and comfortable stay. Great value.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Great location!
The price was OK.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
* When I arrived it was raining heavily, and had to stay in the rain waiting for instructions how to open the door. On the phone I asked where I can wait under a roof till they send me instructions how to get in. I was told: "you are in LA, rain is normal here, wait for instructions by SMS and don't complain about the rain. If we talk longer, you will stay longer in the rain". It would be so easy to tell me that the entrance is in the backyard and that I can wait there under the roof!
* The house is in a very poor area of the city, public transport is far away.
* Bad parking situation on the street. The parking in the backyard is 15$ per night and not 15$ per stay!
* Room is very small. It is officially for 4 persons, but to small for 4 persons, Even for 2 persons it is to small. I was living alone, and it was OK, but second bed was taking all free space.
* It is written that the room has an air conditioner. That's wrong!
* It is written that the room has it's own bath room. That's wrong! Only a small restroom, so only a toilet.
* It is written that the room has it's own kettle. That's wrong!
* It is written that the room has it's own stovetop. That's wrong!
* I was in november, and it was cold in the room. Very small electric heater is not enough.
* Room was not really clean.
* In the end of the stay I was asked if I want to stay longer. I asked about the price, and it was higher that the price at booking.com. I was told that if I don't like the offer I have to book online. At the same time they have blocked me on booking.com, so that I was not able to book this or other rooms of the same owner online! When doing the payment I got a pop up "booking can not be accepted because of an incident during the previous booking". This never happened to me before, very bad experience.
* After the stay I requested several times an invoices / receipt of payment. I also asked booking.com to help me with it.

reviews_list.Main_Review: After dozens of calls to the front desk with no answers, I left and slept elsewhere
reviews_list.Review_Likes: I booked a room requesting late check in, ( the facility offered check in between 3 to 8 pm, but there was another option for late check in which I specified for arrival between 8-9pm (was stuck in traffic, arrived at 8:25pm in the end).Only after I booked the room (and paid through booking), did I receive an email from the facility stating that they cannot accommodate late check in! The booking website allowed me to still make the purchase!From the road (way before 8pm that evening) I tried calling multiple times but to no avail, nobody picked up at the room.

reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Cleaning $35 dollar cleaning fee when the house smelt of weed and stale piss. The room wasn’t hoovered and there was dirt all over the skirting boards. If you are going to change $35 to clean a single room it should be clean. RoomThe rest of the house was quite noisy.Host Host was not helpful at all. When we knocked on the door and accidentally said Airbnb instead of booking.com he said wrong house and closed the door, even though he knew it was a male and a female coming. He also knew we had nowhere to leave our bags till check in and wasn’t flexible with check in time. Additional CostsThe washing machine available is only available at an additional cost even though it doesn’t state this on the booking - perhaps this was naive of me to think it would be free but it should be marked as an additional cost. LocationHeard gunshots whilst waiting in the park and police helicopters circled the area for nearly half an hour afterwards.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Nothing
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Upon checking in, the property owner met me there. Upon walking through the location I was immediately surprised by how dirty and unkept the unit was nothing like the pictures on the website. He then preceded to show me to the room I was renting for 1 night. I WAS SHOCKED! There was no sheets or blankets on the bed just a bare mattress, the floor and walls were filthy and the bathroom was disgusting, there was even urine in the toilet from a previous guest. He then told me he is also renting out the living room to someone who will also be checking in today.The counter tops were dirty, the shower was dirty. It's like the room had not been cleaned in months. I'm not sure how he felt it was okay to show a room that was that disgusting. I didn't even stay...I cancelled. Stay Away he just wants your money!

reviews_list.Main_Review: horrible disgusting unclean nothing like the photos

Everything was dirty, I had to request to switch rooms 5 different times because in every single room there were stains on the carpet and bed, the AC didn’t work, the light didn’t work. The owners didn’t even offer any compensation whatsoever, they were unresponsive, and they insisted I pay through zelle and not through booking so now I’m stuck making claims with my bank. I was visiting LA and ended up finding somewhere else, but was incredibly disappointed with my experience with this property and the hosts.

reviews_list.Review_Likes:
I liked Everything!!! From start to finish, the front desk girl was amazing, the attention was on point. The bedroom was a good size the bathroom/toilet with all the amenities you can expect even better than a regular hotel. The bed was comfy plenty of pillows and a smart tv with all the regular online programing and apps. Free internet yes it was free and fast. Of course the crown jewel was the window that overlooked Venice beach that was perfect. 
The staff even let me put my backpack in the storage room after my checkout and i was permitted to use the showers and toilets which was very convenient before my flight home. There's a small kitchen with free basic breakfast in the morning. The interiors with nice murals and photographs of the area. And you can't beat the location you are in the heart of Venice and a short trip to Santa Monica.
  Overall 9/10

reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Bit noisy, but that's OK if you expect it. And they give free ear plugs for sleeping.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: people was nice, workers were kind and atention was 24/7
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: only problem was the wifi did not work for 2 - 3 days, then it got fixed, that was the only issue

reviews_list.Review_Likes: was a really got place to be!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: they could have better fans and ac was pretty hot at night even in October.

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4 Person Female Dormitory Room with Private Bathroom
reviews_list.Main_Review: amazing location, girls only dorm, friendly staff. on top of a nightclub…soooo loud and shaky, couldn’t sleep until 2am
reviews_list.Review_Likes: amazing location, girls only dorm, friendly staff
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: on top of a nightclub…soooo loud and shaky, couldn’t sleep until 2am when club closed

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 8-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Shared Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: The atmosphere was perfect. Many people from different ethnicities, amazing staff, good music (I'm 42 and my son is 19, and we both liked it). The place was kept clean and the location was perfect. My favorite hostel ever!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: When I booked it said there was paid laundry service, but I had to take an Uber to the laundromat,  costing me an additional $20 on top of cost to wash / dry clothing.

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Shared Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: The location and the instalations are great.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Nothing

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Shared Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Rooms, beds, bathrooms, kitchen, living room and location were really good
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Although the staff was efficiant in their tasks I couldn't really get along with them

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4 Person Female Dormitory Room with Private Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: I love this place! I have been here a couple of times !there’s always a nice vibes, the beds are comfortable and the bathrooms are really clean.

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4 Person Female Dormitory Room with Private Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Great staff and location, free breakfast
excellent location, staff and community was pretty cool to talk to!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: the rooms did get extremely hot

reviews_list.Main_Review: This was my first time staying at a Hostel. It was fun and I would do it again.
reviews_list.Review_Likes:
Great location and staff. 
Also a great way to make new friends.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Bathroom was not restocked on soap and other needed items.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: the location was perfect and the staff were very helpful. the bagel breakfast was a nice extra too
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: there was one shower for the entire floor - that’s not enough - and the water pressure was non existent so even a quick shower took ages

reviews_list.Main_Review: The hostel was a great choice
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Very nice hostel. You go out, cross the street and you are at the Venice beach.  The location is awesome. Thanks to that you don't have to spend time and money to travel to and from the beach. You can stay on the beach to the late hours and walk back to the hostel.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Great location, good room and free breakfast but a lot of sand everywhere and terrible AC
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Best location right by the beach and the skate park. Friendly staff and ok breakfast if you stay for a few days. We had our own sink in the room which was great and we had access to free wifi. A drop off parking right outside for the guests was also very good. There where 1 toilet, 1 combined toilet/shower and 1 shower on our floor in single bathrooms so you did not have to go in a ”stall”.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
sand everywhere and not cleaned enough, our room floor was very sandy even when we checked in.
No AC that worked good at all so the room was very hot
The bed was called a double bed but was only 130 cm wide, even for us who are quite small it was not very comfortable.

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Private Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Nice communal areas. Good breakfast. Amazing location, it’s right on the beach and is so beautiful. Friendly staff.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
Lots of stairs and no elevator so is a struggle if you have a disability or if you’re carrying big bags.
Some beds had reading lights but not all of them.

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4 Person Female Dormitory Room with Private Bathroom
reviews_list.Main_Review: Really nice staff, great vibes and right on the beach.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Blue at the reception was a really chill guy and very nice
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: It’s right on the beach so that’s the big positive. However it can get noisy at night and people keep getting in and out the rooms which prevents sleep

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4 Person Female Dormitory Room with Private Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Close to the beach.Staff super friendly. Early check in and late check out.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Breakfast can be better. Cleanliness too.

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 8-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Shared Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: I loved how friendly the staff are and it’s so easy to make new friends here Iv stayed in many hostels and this one was the best by far very safe clean and comfortable. hi can’t wait to be back!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: it would have been amazing if it had a water fountain

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Private Bathroom
reviews_list.Main_Review: The Venice Beach vibe was everything.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: It's basically on the beach. Amazing location if you travel to see the beach and do all the activities that the boardwalk offers you. The sunset view from the skating parc (which is 45 seconds away from the hostel) is unbelievably amazing and beautiful.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: everything closes very early. Especially from Monday to Wednesday. We arrived on a Monday at 10h30 pm and EVERYTHING was closed. It seemed like a ghost city. Not one soul could be seen outside and quite frankly it was a little scary at first. Our only option to eat was the vending machine or to order doordash, which didnt have more than 1 or 2 options...

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Shared Bathroom
reviews_list.Main_Review: Excellent location, but missing the social aspect of a hostel.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Samesun is right under the famous VENICE sign and leads you right onto the main walkway and beach. You can easily walk to Muscle Beach and the Skate Park. Hiring a bike, I also rode down to Santa Monica pier in about 20min.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: I was looking forward to meeting people through mixer events in the hostel, but was disappointed to hear they were no longer holding social events since COVID (I travelled July 2022). However, the bar/nightclub located downstairs was open for business.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: free breakfast, good location (muscle beach, skateingspot, 30 min walking from santa monica pier)
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: next to bars (quite oisy but they offered earplugs for free)

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 8-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Shared Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: The breakfast is really good, the desk is open 24/7 and the location is right on the beach, there is sink in the bedrooms that don't have a real bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Stairs, don't take a heavy suitcase or be prepared to carry it upstairs, Venice can be a little sketchy at night so Uber yourself or don't go out

reviews_list.Main_Review: I’d highly encourage solo snd or group travelers to consider this centrally located hostel next to Venice beach and east
reviews_list.Review_Likes: location, cleanliness, staff, community
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: a little crowed in common areas

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Great hostel, very nice staff and kind travellers.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The hostel is located above a nightclub and it gets very loud if you want to sleep early it might not be ideal

reviews_list.Review_Likes: The location of the hostel is the best, it's close to stores, restaurants, bars, the beach, places to rent bikes or surfboards, plus it's in the heart of Venice Beach, so I had the classic California experience for the 4th of July. The breakfast is basic (coffee, breads and tangerines), the kitchen is comfortable to make yourself something simple and go out to explore. The room was comfortable and had the basics, I would definitely come back.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The way to connect the hostel with other places in LA can be a bit more complicated by public transportation, but it's more about the city than the hostel. I found the lockers in the rooms to be very small and they were jammed all the time so it was hard to keep the noise down.

reviews_list.Main_Review: I have been to west l.a. many times. There is always something here I haven't
reviews_list.Review_Likes: The atmosphere.  The hostel attracts people with good stories to tell and an appetite to find another in Venice.Guests are quiet and considerate.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: One staff member made me feel like I wasn't supposed to be there.  Perhaps because I am old?

reviews_list.Review_Likes: the Staff are 100% commitment with their duty and male your staying the most smooth and personalized.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
hot water pipe was broken, so some days we should shower with cold water.
the stairs in the entrance. Be prepared to going up with your luggage! but the staff was very kind and helped me with them

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Private Bathroom
reviews_list.Main_Review: amazing location and a clean hostel that provides some rooms with private baths
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Clean, and the location couldn’t be better. Bagels for breakfast.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: no one wore masks

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Unbeatable location
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Shared toilet and shower

reviews_list.Main_Review: Bey good place to stay at Venice Beach
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Staff was really nice and friendly, facilities were clean, room and bed were comfortable.
location, views from private room, clean facilities, large room, friendly staff
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: stairs haha

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Shared Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Never been to a hostel before, but I liked it. Didnt do much there other than sleep. But it can be fun with a mide variety of people.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Showers weren't to clean, but that's because it's om the beach and it had sand in it. But I'm not really complaining.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Friendly staff. Beautiful private room. Beautiful lounge. Right next to the beach. I expected it to be noisy but it was actually very quiet. The sink in the room was useful too.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: I think the breakfast could have been more varied than buns and butter alone. Please offer real coffee!

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Shared Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: everything
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: maybe the bunk bed could be a little bit more confortable

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4 Person Female Dormitory Room with Private Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Amazing location, bed sheets were clean
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
Showers could have been cleaner.

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 8-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Shared Bathroom
reviews_list.Main_Review: All your needs, truly under one roof
reviews_list.Review_Likes: There’s not much to dislike. It’s very butter and buns with the way it’s served. Staff know what they’re doing, and they do it damn well. The place is vibrant, and booming with culture, community and convenience — and you can explore (within reason) at any time of the day. It makes for a memorable Venice Beach stay, at an affordable cost.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The bathroom availabilities definitely needs to be worked on. Things felt incredibly awkward dipping in and out of toilets, especially late at night — and subsequently the doors need a tab of oil. The place could do with a (much more ideal) coat of paint to compliment the place, preferably with the external colour scheme. I would have liked to see an extended range of conveniences too.

reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Dormitories could have more storage space and bathrooms could be a bit cleaner. Breakfast is just some snacks, so don’t expect to get full.

reviews_list.Main_Review: definitely would recommend it, the price for this location is amazing!
reviews_list.Review_Likes: the staff was super friendly and helpful, delicious little pastries for breakfast, the location is amazing - directly at venice beach
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: there’s a nightclub directly underneath or beside the hostel, so just be aware that it can get really loud on the weekend

reviews_list.Review_Likes: BEST LOCATION EVER!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Bed a little noisy

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Great location, very helpful staff, nice kitchen and lounge area to chill.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Shower wasn't great, breakfast was OK first day pretty poor for the rest.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Location, very accessible to public transport, convenience stores, and tourist attractions. Friendly staff, very clean hostel.

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Shared Bathroom
reviews_list.Main_Review: Super Chill Hostel with so much to do close by
reviews_list.Review_Likes: The location is amazing.  Almost right on the beach but just far away enough from the Venice boardwalk if that's not your thing.  Lots of great bars and restaurants like Townhouse, Belle's Beach House and Great White just a stones throw away.  Walking distance to classics like the canals and Hinano Cafe.  Didn't make it to Abbot Kinney but that bustling street is close-by too.  Staff is super friendly
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Some slight cleanliness issues that I saw in the shower but it might have been the consequence of the time of day (AM rush hour). They do have a couple of cleaning folks on staff that are constantly on it.

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room with Shared Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: very clean, good vibes and great location
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: small locker for the luggage.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Awesome location for quick backpackers but pay attention to messages for check in
reviews_list.Review_Likes: One of the best locations to stay next to the beach, bathroom and beds were clean enough and staff were very kind
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Just after the reservation they sent a message but we missed it, but they request BOTH test and vaccine, so we had to do the test right there, noise wasnt that bad since there are restaurants close by

reviews_list.Main_Review: Perfect place for a beach stay—can’t beat the price, location, & friendly people!
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Friendly staff & AMAZING location! My room was clean & had everything I needed.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Can be noisy outside since it’s right on the beach. Would definitely suggest ear plugs.

reviews_list.Main_Review: I am very grateful for Samesun and the wonderful team they have working there!
reviews_list.Review_Likes: i love how diverse it is, so many people from all over the world!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: i didn’t like the night club next door, it kept everyone awake on the weekends, and even on Thursdays. i also think the kitchen could be a little better, it could have a few more appliances.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: I could see the ocean from my bed and from the common area.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The bathroom in the room wasn’t so clean.

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4 Person Female Dormitory Room with Private Bathroom
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Excessive noise at nighttime

reviews_list.Main_Review: Wonderful Stay for an Affordable Price
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Great location right next to the beach. The location was amazing and the price was right. It was a great way to meet people while traveling. Awesome bar sense right below the hostel!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: A bit on the cheaper side and the beds were a little bit uncomfortable. They could due for upgraded pillows and mattresses. Also the room got a bit cold at night.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Staff was very friendly and welcoming, making sure everyone felt welcome. Blue, Heather and Orlando are the people I spoke to there and they were all great. Thank you! I really appreciate the stay.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: There was a drunk guy singing in front of my room at 1:30am the night before I had to leave for the airport and couldn't fall back to sleep after that.

reviews_list.Room_Type: Single Bed in 4 Person Female Dormitory Room with Private Bathroom
reviews_list.Main_Review: I’ve have stayed here a few times
reviews_list.Review_Likes: location
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: parking

reviews_list.Main_Review: it was absolutely brilliant. the hosts are great
reviews_list.Review_Likes: real chill and the hosts were really nice. really accommodating, let us check in early with no fee and had a luggage drop
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: absolutely nothing

reviews_list.Review_Likes: the hostess was soooo lovely, she went above and beyond highly recommend, perfect location can see Hollywood sign from the street.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Perfect for a female solo traveler
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Location, ambience and receptionist
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The fact that my bed curtain was broken but it was a minor problem

reviews_list.Review_Likes: First of all, I could see the Hollywood sign from the street 😁, second it was in a nice place, relatively close to anything I wanted to visit in LA. I had a great time in LA and this is also thanks to the hostel. I recommend this place if you want to visit LA.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: It's not about I didn't like it, but I thought the life in a hostel is more cheerful. It was very quiet at least during my stay. People were friendly, but not as open as in another hostel I experienced. Maybe I jsut came in the wrong time.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: One of the best hostels I've ever stayed. The owner really made me feel like I was home.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Very homy place - would stay here again!
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Very polite staff and the other visitors were also nice.The location was great - you could see the Hollywood sign walking up to it and it was just a few minutes walk between a Metro station and the Walk of Fame!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The only thing I would say needs some improvement are the showers, as they are quite aged but they did their job and were cleaned daily.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: it was a good place to stay! the hosts were great and we had the change to talk a little with some people that was traveling like we were!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: the bathroom that I used was not clean on its totallity, I would rather have a cleaner bathroom option

reviews_list.Main_Review: Clean, comfortable, friendly and modest accomodation, whaich was just what I needed .
reviews_list.Review_Likes: The California was modestly priced and is essentially a hostel, with shared rooms, shared bathrooms and shared kitchen and dining area.  The kitchen was well equipped and clean, the rooms and bath rooms were  as clean as could be expected given the shared nature.I was happy to share the room and bath in order to have a modest price, and the kitchen allowed me to avoid eating out, which would have been expensive.   The people, both the staff and the guests were very nice and considerate, quiet at night, etc.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: It would have been nice not to have been on the top bunk, but it again, that is why it was priced as modestly as it was, so, this is not an objection, just a comment.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Very comfortable bed, I really like the privacy curtain, and the house is very clean. Thanks
Friendly staff, huge quiet house (we thought we got the adress wrong when we first saw the house lol) with mostly cool and friendly people. The kitchen was big as well as the common area.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The showers were not super clean and there were some very unfriendly people down the street.

reviews_list.Main_Review: nice stay, with a Hollywood sign view
reviews_list.Review_Likes: great communication and nice house, it's not like a hostel. more like a regular shared flat
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: bathroom could have been cleaner

reviews_list.Main_Review: Very good value for money, at an excellent location
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Friendly staff, very accommodating. We got extra towels when we requested. Kitchen is well equipped.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Some people looked like they were not travellers but permanently living there.

reviews_list.Main_Review: book here, and more if you want to stay in Hollywood and not spend a lot
reviews_list.Review_Likes: it’s close to Hollywood.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: the bathroom was really small, but price/benefit it’s worth it.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: I love that we had a kitchen and patio for our use.  Very good localization

Location is exceptional. Our purpose for staying there was to see a concert at the Fonda Theater, and the hostel was walking distance to the theatre. Location is convenient and central to just about every iconic attraction in LA, so ease of access was great. It's located on a nice quiet neighborhood street, off the main road, which was also nice. It felt safe too.The home was peaceful and relaxed, which we really appreciated. All of our roommates and guests were courteous and everyone respected quiet hours. I like that there was a full kitchen available if you want to cook or store any food. (We didn't use the kitchen, but thought it was a nice feature). They also provided us with sheets, blankets and pillows which was helpful! If you prefer more blankets though, I'd recommend bringing some of your own or a sleeping bag. Definitely bring a towel though. The staff who checked us in was very sweet and helpful. Rooms were generally clean. Common areas were clean and seemed well-kept.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Bathrooms could have been a bit cleaner, but I know guest usage is a big part of that too. A few of the bathrooms are quite small as well. (no one's fault there, it's just an old LA home!)

reviews_list.Review_Likes: The hostel had a fantastic location close to the Metro, Walk of Fame and the Griffith Observatory. It also was very quite during the night.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: I didn't like the plastic covers on the bed.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Nice and private hostel near Hollywood
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Private hostel with nice common area. Well equipped kitchen. The light interior makes you feel comfortable. Great location, just a few minutes to Walk of Fame. Good Wifi connection. Free bedding and towels.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: My room was a walk-through room, so it was not quiet in the morning. The bathrooms were sometimes a bit dirty (dirty, wet floor and lots of hairs).

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Great Location and the people were great. Also, as a business professional traveling for work, I loved that there were quiet hours in place.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The cleanliness of the bathrooms always left something to be desired. Also, I came back quite a few times and the front door was locked. This wasn't an issue because the side or back door was open, but it was always a concern.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: I liked being able to meet new people, the price of the stay, and the location.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Was not allowed to smoke on the property, even outside. There was no recreation room where I could relax at the end of the night and watch tv.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Good stay for a cheap price
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Very helpful host and good location, close to the Walk of Fame, Hollywood Sign and Griffith Observatory, close to a Metro station and bus service. Can feel a bit sketchy at night. House has a garden in the back and terrace in the front, large common area and rooms. Mine even had a big balcony.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The women's room is passed through by other people getting to their room. Did not disturb be much though. Could be cleaner, especially the kitchen.It's not really a traveler's hostel, many guests were working most of the time. It's always very quiet to accomodate everyones schedule.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: The breakfast was ok
Highly recommend. Good location, big kitchen and friendly people!
Staff really nice and clean accommodation
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: only cons was its not a 4 dorms but its a shared dorms. our "4 beds" dorm was in the middle of 2 other rooms so it's wasnt quiet with the ongoing crossing

reviews_list.Review_Likes: The lady who is running the hostel is very nice and sweet.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Matrases in plastic covers.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: aircord perfect
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: toilet no clean

reviews_list.Main_Review: Great stay and good experience, very nice guesthouse.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Convenient location for visiting Hollywood, very nice and clean houseVery good management of many guests
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Despite the presence of 3 bathrooms often waiting for utilization

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Location, kitchen, the garden, internet were good. The kind host gave me the extra blanket I asked for.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
1.Someone was in a private room and needed to walk through the 4 bed dormitory to get out. That was a bit uncomfortable but just a minor thing.
2.another minor thing: The shoe smell in the bedroom from other guests'shoes. Not entirely a fault of the host who put a shoe rack outside of the bedrooms, it's just a small one
3.the sinks and showers were a bit dirty almost all the time

reviews_list.Main_Review: Great place to feel comfortable, everybody is pleasant. Bathrooms are not for the faint hearted.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Location is great, secure gate at the front. People seemed to live there or be long term stays which made us feel comfortable leaving our bags in the room.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Bathrooms have signs saying not to put toilet paper into the toilets which meant people put the toilet paper in the waste bins next to the toilet which were not taken out daily.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Great location. The host showed diversity 👏.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Good if you want a really quiet place
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Confortable, good price
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The location, not safe to walk around the neighborhood. Too many restrictions.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Nice little hostel in quiet neigborhood and walking distance to Hollywood Boulevard.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Nice little hostel in walking distance to Hollywood Boulevard. Great kitchen to prepare your own food. Messages were answered rapidly.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The mattresses could be more comfortable and there should be more bathrooms. 3 bathrooms is sometimes not enough for all of the people staying in the hostel.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: The paint from the ceiling was falling down on the bed.

reviews_list.Main_Review: It was a ok stay but I missed the hostel feeling.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: It was calm and safe and there was free tea, coffee and hot Chocolate. The hosts were very friendly.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: There was no hostel vibe. Not a lot of people doing something together. There was not much space to secure the own stuff. The bads made loud noices.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: the electricity outlet next to the bed can't be used at night because the mattress covers it. so I can't charge my devices at night, so I have to charge them in the morning
The Hospitality and the comfort.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Nothing to dislike at all, everything was fine.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: I had a great time at this accommodation, the location is perfect. The rooms are kept clean and tidy, beds are extremely confident, great facilities provided and theres was free Turkish coffee which I really enjoyed.I will definitely be back

It was far enough away from Hollywood Blvd that it was safe and quiet. There was a full kitchen lots of places to sit and the beds each had plenty of outlets. Each room had 2-3 bunk beds and they were comfortable. There was 3 bathrooms, each with a shower. I couldn't recommend it enough. It was a phenomenal price and the host was so nice and accommodating, not to mention the late check in times was very helpful. There are lockers available and she has a few locks to share, but honestly I asked her if I could just leave my bags in my room and she said that should work fine and she's never had any issues of theft or safety with them and I didn't either. The door to the property is locked and door protected so it's very secure just generally. If you're looking for a good and cost effective hostel, I'd recommend going here. If I come back to LA for another solo trip I will for sure be staying here again!
A very comfortable, homely atmosphere. The staff who welcomed us was so kind, and gave us a nice tour of the house. The beds were also very comfortable!
Location is great. I have stayed here before and would stay here again.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Could use a bigger fan in the bedroom that I was in.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: perfect !
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: maybe not enough bathrooms

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Staff is really friendly! and help everything that they can help! Really appreciate
There was dirt under the bed. The guests were rude. The beds were uncomfortable. The bathrooms were dirty and the rooms were over crowded.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Ibid.

reviews_list.Review_Likes:
The location was good.
The kitchen was well equipped.
The host was very nice and friendly.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
There was plastic around the matras that wasn’t comfortable. 
No AC in the rooms, only fans that made a lot of noise.
No curtains for the terrace so there was a lot of sunlight in the morning.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Nice place to stay. Easy access to Hollywood Blvd. and public transit.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Felt like staying over at family
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Home-like atmosphere, house style
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: No wireless payment possible

reviews_list.Main_Review: excellent and thoughtful hosts really nice setting
reviews_list.Review_Likes: lovely charming house with nice outdoor space
Everything about this place is just great !
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: There's nothing I can think about !

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Location
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The bathroom was not very clean.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Everything!
everything! everyone was nice and quiet, the garden was gorgeous, and there were cute kitties to watch play in the morning before my day :)
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: bed a lil squeaky, but I was always so tired when I got back home that I’d pass out immediately and it not matter

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Location to Hollywood Blvd and free parking
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Bathrooms dirty, no towels, people coming and going slamming doors all night, no fan, no air conditioning, and they keep a light on in room all night so everyone who comes and goes can see.  Didn't sleep a wink when I was there and left a night early.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: I love the set up! it is a large home with lots of space. the facilities are cleaned daily. The owners are very friendly, attentive and available whenever you need. The location is close to many of Hollywood’s famous spots! It is also a quiet and safe neighborhood. it’s off the main Hollywood Boulevard and feels very suburban. I would definitely stay again for the solo traveler! LGBTQ friendly.
If you are looking for a hostel in LA, this one is simply the best one.

Beautiful old home, very friendly staff. Great Place!
Thanks

reviews_list.Main_Review: Clean, safe area, centrally located to tourist sites.  Perfect!
reviews_list.Review_Likes: The hostel was very clean.  The host and staff very nice and helpful.  The hostel is in a very nice and quiet residential area that is centrally located within walking distance to the Walk of Fame and other tourist sites. Highly recommended!

reviews_list.Main_Review: It's really a good place to stay guys. Just come any try it
reviews_list.Review_Likes: We don't have breakfast, you must to cook buy yourself. But we have everything's at the kitchen if you want to cooking, properly, very clean
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: I like everythings, there's safe nobody allowed to drink alcohol inside, and smoking forbidden I really like, I recommend you this hostel  if you want a safe place.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Best hostel I've ever stayed in.  The hosts are very nice people, ready to help with any question.  Wonderful clean kitchen, 3 bathrooms.  About living in this place, there were only positive impressions!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: All perfectly

reviews_list.Review_Likes: quite , super clean , Safe
Very confortable
Feel safe, comftable, location, the filter for water, the kitchen, the space, tables outside, the charger on the bed, the towel.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Restroom need some cleaning

reviews_list.Review_Likes: The hostel itself has a homey vibe. And the location is great, really close to the Hollywood.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: That being said, there are A LOT of people who actually live there. Like, it seemed like they are here to find jobs or something. Also the bathrooms were not that clean:(

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Great location with exceptional price. It’s very close to the Hollywood sign and the Walk of Fame. The house is very clean. There are 3 bathrooms in the house so there’s always 1 available when you need. The host is extremely nice and accommodating. Check-in is very easy. Highly recommended and I would definitely stay here again when I come back.

reviews_list.Main_Review: I stayed only one night there. It’s really close to Hollywood Sign and Walk of Fame.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: I liked the hosts a lot because they were really friendly and welcoming. Helpful and nice hosts, 10 out of 10!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The bathrooms were dirty and there were other people who used our room to get into their own room which was kind of noisy each time when they opened the doors.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Best place to stay in Hollywood
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Best location in Hollywood. Best hospitality. Nice place. Great Wifi. Love this place! Definitely come back!
The place feels like a home🤗it is quite, clean, people is friendly and the best is the location. If I return to LA I’m oing to choose this place again FOR SURE. Thank you 🤗

reviews_list.Main_Review: Touristic places are nearby (Hollywood sign, Hollywood boulevard, restaurants, etc).
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Very clean and quiet house.
Limpio, calmado, centrado, seguro.Pude caminar al Griffith, al paseo de las estrellas y al Hollywood sign desde la casa. Se siente más como casa que hostal. Súper recomendado!

The house is pretty and the backyard is nice. It's close to Griffith observatory and Hollywood boulevard if you are a walker and there is a lot of free parking spot on the street. The only staff member I encountered there was really nice to me.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: weird and awkward ambiance, full of older mens just hanging around or here to work during the nighttime... I would not recommande to younger traveler. I felt like I was disturbing everyone. be careful there is mold in the bathroom and it smells bad because they don't want you to throw your used toilet paper in the toilet (?!)

reviews_list.Main_Review: Not the best, but not the worst. Good location and ideal if you don't want to talk to anyone.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Not a hostel to go to if you want to interact with people, the host lives there with his wife so they procure a very tense and quiet environment, telling us to keep quite if we talk too much
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: NO AC or fans in the rooms which is ridiculous. This didn't help the smell either.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: noisy beds, toilets a little bit dirty but cleaned halfway through our stay
Nice and functional kitchen, sufficient number of toilets. Staff were nice and helpful!
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Noisy and creaky floors and doors, toilets not super clean. Have to walk through another room to get to our room.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Great place for tired travellers, you get what you pay for and it’s a nice environment…
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Alex and letti (owners) are very nice people, they always smile and say hello and have given me towels, a lock for my locker and showed me round everywhere. They let you just live your life without being over bearing, which is nice. the owners live on site but not in the building. there are cameras in the public areas including the locker area which is great as you know everything will be safe but I really don’t think anyone would steal from you in this hostel, it’s just not that type of place. it’s safe (locked outside gate and cameras), warm and a good place for tired travellers to rest. lots of outdoor space front and back garden. To say how many people stay here it’s very quiet and you don’t often see people in the day, at night it’s social and people cook and eat together. very nice :)
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: guys - it’s a low budget hostel for a safe place to sleep and to meet nice people. the kitchen is well equipped and clean. Bathrooms are well used, just have some crocs or sandals to walk around in. the only thing I think is slightly strange is that sometimes there are people who you never see sharing a room with you, just made me a little unsettled (maybe that’s just me!!)…

reviews_list.Review_Likes: the hostel was just 10 minutes by car form the Universal Studios.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: It was not very clean, my bedroom had a terrible smell, bathroom was dirty, and kitchen was messy.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Dirty and stinky, much like Hollywood.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: The place is nice: three bathrooms, a big kitchen, and a living room.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Overall, the property is deceivingly dirty and gross: the bathrooms were not washed once during my week-long stay, and the kitchen only once. People tend to leave the common spaces dirty and the host does not hold them accountable for anything.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: the staff was nice and polite.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: bathrooms were never clean, people’s hair all over. even though it’s cheap, it’s a hostel and not an apartment for rent, so bare minimum basics, such as regular scrupulous cleaning have to be complied.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: The staff is very friendly, they will always help and prompt, meet halfway if you need to call in earlier.  The guesthouse is clean, there is everything you need for cooking.  The guesthouse is close to all shops and the metro.  Convenient location, quiet area, close to the Walk of Fame and Hollywood Hills.
Good location, nice people.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Not the best cleaning.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: The location was nice, the staff was friendly, and it was inexpensive
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: The beds were pretty uncomfortable and they don’t allow you to flush toilet paper down the toilet so you have to throw it away which is kind of gross

reviews_list.Main_Review: Dirty and messy but with great location
reviews_list.Review_Likes: Nice small house and nice reception. Great location near walk of fame, main studios and griffith Park.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
Cleanliness was an issue. Sheet didn't look properly washed and bathroom was quite dirty.
Generally the facilities looked a bit aged

reviews_list.Review_Likes: the owner was very friendly and nice
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes:
- the pictures in bookingcom do not match the real look of the rooms (bunk beds)
- anyone can enter any room so there is no way to secure your stuff 
- it was very hot in our room despite the “air conditioning” that should have been present X some rooms were too cold
- there was no hostel vibe, some people were not even travellers, but staying long-term

reviews_list.Review_Likes: This review has been hidden because it doesn't meet our guidelines.

There was no air conditioning, there was just one tower fan in each room. Smoking had to be done right at the end of the property which was inconvenient at times.  The rooms smelled terrible!! Cups were mostly dirty so I didn't even use any but there are much more better hostels to stay at near this one.
The house is very big
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: You cannot do anything

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Kitchen seemed relatively new, outdoor seating. Hosts were friendly and check-in/out was very easy.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: Bathrooms weren’t nice or clean, there was hair, the floor was almost always flooded and the toilets were dirty (you’re also not allowed to flush toilet paper but supposed to throw it in a trash can). Kitchen wasn’t very well equipped, there could be more utensils and plates for the number of people being in the hostel and the paper towels weren’t refilled.

reviews_list.Main_Review: The place is a very cheap option but with that, don’t expect to get good sleep.
reviews_list.Review_Likes: I didn’t get good sleep. In the women’s bunk bed room there are two doors that lead to other rooms where others sleep. I was woken up at 10:30pm to loud talking, 1:15am and 3am by those walking between my room and the others. The place is a very cheap option but with that, don’t expect to get good sleep.

reviews_list.Main_Review: Stay was manageable, but could have been better
reviews_list.Review_Likes: We opted for this property due to its location. Shared kitchen & living room facilities were provided, but we have seen better.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: However, the quality of the facilities were not quite up to our expectations. Cleanliness of the place and facilities could be better. With no lifts, we had to carry our heavy luggage up the stairs (maybe good for backpackers!!!). Plus the shared dorm services were quite restrictive for our taste

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Most people live here permanently, not much of a hostel vibe. Felt like you were intruding on their private space… very uncomfortable. Bathroom was dirty and felt rather unusable. Loud outside maintenance on the property started at 8am which was extremely disruptive, but at the same time the only noise that was tolerated. You’d get a snide remark or glare if you made more sound than an average footstep from the folks living there at any time during the day (many worked nights and slept during day). Would not stay here again.
It was quiet.  The other guests were quiet and there was no noise pollution from outside.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: It felt shabby. Everything was at a bare minium.  The fixtures, like the knobs and doors, didn't fit well.  There were no towels to dry your hands in the kitchen. Stored food in thefridge and on shelves was not monitored well.  There were no clothes washing facillites. Although it looked well located on the map, it was far from both subway stations-nothing seemed less than a 10 minute walk away.  I was disappointed here because the pictures were so nice.  Also, despite what my reservation confirmation said, there was no breakfast as of  October 31, 2021.

reviews_list.Review_Likes: close to attractions. comfy bed.
reviews_list.Review_Dislikes: bathroom is limited. a lot of guests. the bed is not that clean.(I think there are insects in the bed.)

reviews_list.Review_Likes: Great location. Great host.
my boyfriend lost his iPhone there and the don’t give us solutions

Großartige Gastgeberin die sich sehr bemüht hat uns bei allem zu helfen! Typisches Vorstadthaus als Hostel Klasse! Uns hat es super gefallen hier & haben uns wie zuhause gefühlt. Große Küche, Garten & tolle Veranda wo morgens seinen Kaffee trinken! Lage war super! Es ist ruhig gelegen und sicher. Metro station & walk of fame ist in wenigen Minuten zu Fuß zu erreichen! Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind immer direkt bei den Metrostation.
Les hôtes sont super gentils et toujours disponibles.

A anfitriã é super gentil e atenciosa! 
Cheguei na casa com duas malas super pesadas e ela prontamente veio me ajudar a levá-las para o quarto. Muito solicita, me explicou tudo sobre o funcionamento da casa e me deixou muito à vontade.
Além disso, a casa fica em uma localização perfeita, pertinho da calçada da fama, mas ao mesmo tempo não fica perto do tumulto como algumas acomodações em torno. Fica num bairro mais residencial. Isso nos faz sentir mais seguros.
Recomendo!
lindo hostal
Cena, lokalizacja, właściciele, domek - wszystko super! Można zostawić plecaki, wykąpać się po wymeldowaniu, skorzystać z kuchni, poczekać do wyjazdu - wszystko co powinien mieć hostel.
las habitaciones
